name: Dragonfire Bakery
description:
The dragon chef has knocked over the ingredient barrels. Sort them out before they fall into the cauldron.

Rotate squares of four ingredients by clicking between them. Line up recipes horizontally, and let them fall into the cauldron. You get more points if you stack multiple recipes, but you lose points if the falling ingredients don't make a recipe. Click the dragon to make the ingredients fall one row immediately.

You can only rotate clockwise, for reasons -- your assistant assures you -- that have nothing to do with the large dimensional rift slowly coalescing in the basement.
